title: The Walking Dead
resume: Sheriff's deputy Rick Grimes awakens from a coma to find a post-apocalyptic world dominated by flesh-eating zombies. He sets out to find his family and encounters many other survivors along the way.

Featured Crew Frank Darabont Creator Discussions   Reviews Videos   Images   Changes Report Share Discussions General  485 Content Issues  15 Images Backdrops  108 Posters  71 Videos Trailers  1 Teasers  0 Clips  0 Featurettes  0 Opening Credits  0 Top Billed Cast Andrew Lincoln Rick Grimes Norman Reedus Daryl Dixon Lauren Cohan Maggie Greene Danai Gurira Michonne Christian Serratos Rosita Espinosa Full Cast & Crew Current Season Season 8 2017 | 16 Episodes View All Seasons Social Reviews  2 Discussions  500 t A review by tmdb38541732  6.0 Written by  tmdb38541732  on February 28, 2017 Not bad for a horror/drama. If you're obsessed with zombie lore and the idea of watching the long-term effects spanning years at a time on an entire cast of characters, then this show is for you. There are a lot of scary parts with zombies eating and the gore and visual effects are award winning, but the show is mostly how people get along with each other during an apocalyptic setting and how they rebuild civilization or just live moment to moment.
